description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Environmental Services and Contaminated Sites Management (ESCSM) Branch of PSPC, has a requirement to establish up to six (6) competitive Contracts with Task Authorization to provide Contaminated Sites Remediation Services for a total of $30,000,000 (GST included).
full_summary:
================

### Title - EZ897-232213A

The Government of Canada invites Contractors to submit Proposals on the provision of Contaminated Sites Remediation Services.

#### Reference Information:
--------------------------------
- Reference Number: WS4043183955
- Solicitation Number: WS4043183955
- Amendment Number: 3

#### Notice Information:
------------------------
- Publication Date: October 3, 2023
- Tender Closing Date: November 21, 2023, 14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: None
- Expected Contract End Date: November 30, 2026

#### Contract Opportunity:
-------------------------
The intention is to pursue up to six (6) Task Authorization Contracts with Contractors to provide Remediation Services for Contaminated Sites. A total budget of $30,000,000 (GST included) is provisioned for this purpose.

#### Scope of Work (SOW):
----------------------------
The SOW entails program management, project management, field work, and technical services for the remediation of contaminated sites situated on federal lands in the Yukon and British Columbia, or adjacent offsite properties.

#### Area of Operations:
-------------------------
- The Yukon
- British Columbia

#### Selection Criteria:
----------------------

- Contractors shall submit their Proposals based on a comprehensive evaluation criteria, focusing on the Technical Merit of the Proposal and the Price quotation provided.

#### Notice Documentation:
-------------------------

- Tender Description: The provided documentation attached as [link].
- Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17616209?extsite=MTc2MTYyMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17616209?extsite=MTc2MTYyMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Important Notice:
----------------------

- The Tender Status displayed is Expired. No Propals are being accepted at this time.

#### Contract Information:
-------------------------

- Contracting Entity: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
- Contact Information:

    - Janie Leung, Lead, Environmental Services and Contaminated Sites Management (ESCSM) Branch
    - Phone: None
    - Email: janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    - Postal Code: None

Let me know if there is anything else I can do to assist you further!
